channel.title: Comments on: 9 Bourbaki founding members, really?

item.title: By: David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description:
Certainly if one can access the Springer version, https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/BF03025255.pdf should work. But I guess that's not what you wanted? In any case, supplying the full reference helps future readers facing link rot:
Parshall, K.V.H., Beaulieu, L. "Years ago". The Mathematical Intelligencer 15, 27–35 (1993). https://doi.org/10.1007/BF03025255
The authors and title of that are not correct, but it's how it's stored in Springer's database.
item.content:encoded:
Certainly if one can access the Springer version, https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/BF03025255.pdf should work. But I guess that’s not what you wanted? In any case, supplying the full reference helps future readers facing link rot:

Parshall, K.V.H., Beaulieu, L. “Years ago”. The Mathematical Intelligencer 15, 27–35 (1993). https://doi.org/10.1007/BF03025255

The authors and title of that are not correct, but it’s how it’s stored in Springer’s database.
